item.title: 宝马称美国关税将使汽车利润率下降一个百分点
item.description: 宝马公司首席财务官周五表示，根据事先获得的一份演讲稿，截至3月12日对美国进口汽车征收的附加关税将使其汽车业务的利润率减少一个百分点。【原文：BMW's Chief Financial Officer said on Friday that the added tariffs on U.S. imports imposed up until March 12 would reduce its earnings margin in the autos segment by one percentage point, according to a copy of his speech seen in advance.】

item.title: 英国 1 月经济意外萎缩 0.1
item.description: 英国国家统计局周五公布的数据显示，受制造业产出较12月份大幅下降的影响，英国1月份经济产出意外萎缩0.1%。【原文：Britain's economic output contracted unexpectedly by 0.1% in January, pulled down by a sharp drop in manufacturing output compared with December, data from the Office for National Statistics showed on Friday.】

item.title: 拉加德：特朗普的贸易战为欧洲敲响了 "警钟
item.description: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）周五表示，一场全面的全球贸易战尤其会伤害美国，并可能重新激发欧洲对团结的推动。【原文：A full-scale global trade war would hurt the United States in particular and could re-energise Europe's push towards unity, European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said on Friday.】

item.title: 世界顶级电子产品制造商富士康第四季度利润下降 13
item.description: 全球最大的合约电子生产商台湾富士康公布第四季度利润下降 13%，原因是其消费电子部门的疲软表现抵消了人工智能服务器部门业务的强劲表现。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker, reported a 13% drop in fourth-quarter profit as weak performance in its consumer electronics division offset strength in its AI server segment business.】

item.title: 中国销售疲软、刹车问题困扰盈利，宝马净利润下滑
item.description: 由于在中国和德国的销售疲软，以及制动器问题导致的延期交货，宝马公司的业绩受到影响，2024 年的净利润下降了三分之一以上，降至 76.8 亿欧元（83.2 亿美元），与伦敦证交所集团的预测一致。【原文：BMW's net profit crashed by over a third in 2024 to 7.68 billion euros ($8.32 billion), in line with an LSEG forecast, after a combination of weak sales in China and Germany as well as delivery hold-ups because of problems with a brake dented performance.】

item.title: 中国市场销售疲软，刹车问题困扰盈利，宝马净利润下滑
item.description: 由于在中国和德国的销售疲软，以及制动器问题导致的延期交货，宝马公司的业绩受到影响，2024 年的净利润下降了三分之一以上，降至 76.8 亿欧元（83.2 亿美元），与伦敦证交所集团的预测一致。【原文：BMW's net profit crashed by over a third in 2024 to 7.68 billion euros ($8.32 billion), in line with an LSEG forecast, after a combination of weak sales in China and Germany as well as delivery hold-ups because of problems with a brake dented performance.】

item.title: 印尼为苹果公司部分 iPhone 16 系列产品颁发电信许可证
item.description: 印度尼西亚通信部网站称，该部已为苹果公司的部分 iPhone 16 系列产品颁发了电信许可证。【原文：Indonesia's communications ministry has issued a telecommunications permit for some of Apple's iPhone 16 series, according to the ministry's website.】

item.title: 特斯拉董事长辞去澳大利亚最大风险投资公司运营合伙人职务
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，特斯拉董事长罗宾-登霍姆（Robyn Denholm）已辞去澳大利亚最大风险投资基金黑鸟风险投资公司（Blackbird VC）运营合伙人的职务，但她仍是该公司的董事会成员和顾问。【原文：Tesla chair Robyn Denholm has moved out of her role as operating partner at Australia's biggest venture capital fund, Blackbird VC, people familiar with the situation said, while she remains a board member and adviser to the firm.】

item.title: 市场抛售，亚洲对冲基金表现优于美国同行
item.description: 亚洲对冲基金比美国对冲基金更好地经受住了 3 月份市场大跌的考验，这得益于全球投资者纷纷涌入中国市场，中国股市表现相对优异。【原文：Asia hedge funds weathered the March selloff in markets better than their U.S. counterparts, helped by the relative outperformance of Chinese stocks as global investors rushed into that market.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，特斯拉计划将Model Y的生产成本至少降低20%，以捍卫中国市场份额
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，特斯拉将在上海生产其最畅销车型Y的低成本版本，旨在收复在其第二大市场价格战中失去的阵地。【原文：Tesla will make a lower-cost version of its best-selling Model Y in Shanghai, three people with knowledge of the matter said, aiming to regain ground lost during a price war in its second-largest market.】

item.title: 条款表显示，新加坡星展银行通过美元债券融资 20 亿美元
item.description: 据路透社周五看到的一份条款书显示，东南亚最大的银行星展集团已通过发行多期美元高级债券筹集了 20 亿美元资金，用于一般业务目的和财务活动。【原文：DBS Group , Southeast Asia's biggest bank, has raised $2 billion through a multi-tranche U.S. dollar senior bond issuance for general business purposes and to finance treasury activities, according to a term sheet seen by Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，甲骨文将考虑在印度尼西亚巴淡岛建立数据中心
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士的话报道，甲骨文公司正在与印度尼西亚政府商讨在该国巴淡岛建立云服务中心的事宜。【原文：Oracle Corp is in discussions with Indonesia's government to establish a cloud services center in the country's Batam Island, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加拿大对头号供应商征收 100%的关税后，中国将面临菜籽粕短缺问题
item.description: 由于中国政府对头号出口国加拿大的船运征收关税扰乱了贸易，而且替代来源不太可能弥补缺口，因此到今年第三季度，中国很可能面临菜籽粕供应短缺。【原文：China is likely to face a supply shortage of rapeseed meal by the third quarter of this year as Beijing's tariffs on shipments from top exporter Canada disrupt trade and as alternative sources are unlikely to make up the deficit.】

item.title: 中国就向美国利益集团出售港口一事发表批评性评论后，长江和记股价下跌
item.description: 中国港澳办在国家媒体上发表评论文章，批评香港企业集团长江和记最近出售港口是对中国的背叛，该公司股价周五下跌超过 6%。【原文：Shares of Hong Kong conglomerate CK Hutchison slid more than 6% on Friday after China's Hong Kong and Macau Affairs Office posted a commentary in state media criticising the company's recent port sale as a betrayal of China.】

item.title: 乌克兰停火协议仍遥遥无期，石油价格反弹
item.description: 周五油价反弹，收复了上一交易日超过1%的部分跌幅，部分原因是乌克兰战争迅速结束的前景日益暗淡，这可能会带来更多的俄罗斯能源供应。【原文：Oil prices rebounded on Friday to recover some of their more than 1% losses in the previous session, partly due to diminishing prospects of a quick end to the Ukraine war that could bring back more Russian energy supplies.】

item.title: 日本 2 月通胀可能因恢复能源补贴而降温
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，由于能源补贴的恢复，日本 2 月份的核心通胀率可能比上月有所下降，但总体价格趋势可能会使决策者继续按计划在今年再次加息。【原文：Japan's core inflation likely decelerated in February from the previous month due to the resumption of energy subsidies, a Reuters poll showed, though the overall price trends will likely keep policymakers on track to raise rates again this year.】

item.title: 已更新锂电池政策的航空公司
item.description: 亚洲的几家航空公司已经更新了关于机上携带锂电池的指南。手机和电子烟等设备中都装有锂电池，一旦发生故障，就会产生烟雾、火灾或极度高温。【原文：Several airlines in Asia have updated their guidance on carrying lithium batteries onboard. The batteries are in devices such as cellphones and e-cigarettes, and can malfunction to produce smoke, fire or extreme heat.】

item.title: 日本央行将讨论特朗普贸易战带来的经济风险，利率将保持稳定
item.description: 日本央行下周将维持利率稳定，并讨论不断升级的美国贸易战对依赖出口的日本经济构成了多大风险，这将是日本央行下一次加息时机的关键。【原文：The Bank of Japan is set to keep interest rates steady next week and discuss just how much of a risk the escalating U.S. trade war poses to the export-reliant economy, which will be key to the timing of its next rate hike.】

item.title: 日本央行将讨论特朗普贸易战带来的经济风险，利率将保持稳定
item.description: 日本央行下周将维持利率稳定，并讨论不断升级的美国贸易战对依赖出口的日本经济构成了多大风险，这将是日本央行下一次加息时机的关键。【原文：The Bank of Japan is set to keep interest rates steady next week and discuss just how much of a risk the escalating U.S. trade war poses to the export-reliant economy, which will be key to the timing of its next rate hike.】

item.title: 亚洲股市持稳；贸易战升级，黄金创历史新高
item.description: 由于全球贸易紧张局势升级令投资者感到紧张，并引发了对避险资产的追捧，黄金创下了历史新高。【原文：Asia shares rose on Friday and global markets attempted a rebound after a brutal selloff, while gold reached a record as an escalation of global trade tensions left investors nervous and sparked a flight to safe-haven assets.】

item.title: DeepSeek 之后，中国的基金经理们打败了 High-Flyer 的人工智能之路
item.description: 中国对冲基金 "高飞"（High-Flyer）在市场交易中使用人工智能，引发了内地资产管理公司之间的人工智能军备竞赛，可能会撼动中国 10 万亿美元的基金管理行业。【原文：Chinese hedge fund High-Flyer's use of artificial intelligence in trading markets has spurred an AI arms race among mainland asset managers that could shake up the country's $10 trillion fund management industry.】

item.title: 全球贸易紧张局势升级，美元坚挺，欧元漂移
item.description: 周五，由于市场正努力应对不断升级的全球贸易紧张局势和经济急剧下滑的风险，美元普遍走强，欧元则进一步远离五个月高点。【原文：The U.S. dollar was broadly firmer on Friday with the euro pulling further away from a five-month peak as markets grappled with escalating global trade tensions and risks of a sharp economic downturn.】

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普让中国股市（在某种程度上）再度伟大
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发动的大范围贸易战引发了对经济衰退的担忧，全球投资者找到了一个不太可能的新避难所：中国股票。【原文：As U.S. President Donald Trump's wide-ranging trade war rouses fears of recession, global investors have found an unlikely new sanctuary: Chinese equities.】

item.title: 黄金再创新高，有望达到 3,000 美元峰值
item.description: 周五，由于美国关税的不确定性和对贸易紧张局势的担忧，以及对美联储放松货币政策的预期增强，黄金价格创下历史新高。【原文：Gold hit a record high on Friday, as uncertainty over U.S. tariffs and fears of trade tensions propelled prices, along with increased expectations of monetary policy easing by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，与硅谷相比，DeepSeek 将专注于研究而非收入
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，中国人工智能聊天机器人深鉴科技（DeepSeek）选择专注于研究而非营收，因为其亿万富翁创始人决定不效仿硅谷竞争对手，利用销售额突然飙升的机会。【原文：Chinese AI chatbot DeepSeek is choosing to focus on research over revenue, as its billionaire founder has decided not to follow Silicon Valley rivals by taking advantage of a sudden jump in sales, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: Vietnam reviewing duties to boost import of US LNG, high-tech goods, PM says
item.description: Vietnam is reviewing its duties on U.S. goods, including on liquefied natural gas, agriculture and high-tech products, Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh told the U.S. ambassador to the country, a report on the government's website said.

item.title: Australian government to give ANZ $1.3 bln loan guarantee for Pacific operations
item.description: The Australian government will be giving ANZ Group a loan guarantee worth A$2 billion ($1.26 billion) to keep selling its services in the Pacific region, the lender said on Friday.

item.title: Samsung SDI to issue new shares and invest in U.S. joint venture with GM
item.description: Samsung SDI said it would issue new shares worth 2 trillion won ($1.38 billion) in a regulatory filing on Friday and use the proceeds to invest in a U.S. joint venture with General Motors and expand its factory capacity in Hungary among others.

item.title: CERAweek: AI leading to faster, cheaper oil production, executives say
item.description: Artificial intelligence is speeding up oil and gas drilling and prompting companies to take a second look at places they had viewed as too difficult or expensive to develop, executives detailed during the CERAWeek conference in Houston.

item.title: Brazil's Eletrobras posts 25% rise in fourth-quarter net profit
item.description: Brazilian power firm Eletrobras reported on Thursday a near 25% increase in its fourth-quarter net profit from a year earlier to 1.11 billion reais ($191.4 million).
